content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for considering my apartment. As a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am depending on a reliable and responsible tenant. Therefore, I want to know how long you plan to stay in the apartment.

Also, I would like to know if you have any references or previous landlords that I can contact to verify your reliability and responsibility.

Lastly, I would like to know if you are willing to sign a lease agreement for the entire year, or if you would prefer a shorter term.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your concerns, Emilia. I understand that you want a reliable and responsible tenant for my apartment. In terms of your tenancy length, I am open to discussing a lease agreement for the entire year, but I am also open to discussing shorter terms.

Regarding your references, I would appreciate if you can provide me with some information about your previous landlords and any issues that you may have had with them. This will help me better understand your level of responsibility and reliability as a tenant.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your concerns, but I don't have any references or previous landlords to provide. However, I can assure you that I am a responsible and reliable person. I have always paid my rent on time and have never had any issues with my previous landlords. I am also currently in a stable living situation and plan to stay in the apartment for at least 12 months.

Regarding the rental price, I am willing to discuss a fair and reasonable rental price based on the location and size of the apartment. I am open to negotiating, but I am looking for the lowest price possible.

If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know. I am happy to provide any additional information that you may need.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your response, Emilia. I appreciate your honesty and understanding of my concerns.

Based on the location and size of the apartment, I would be willing to discuss a rental price that is fair and reasonable. However, as a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. Therefore, I would like to propose a rental price of €1,500 per month.

Please let me know if this is a fair and reasonable rental price for you. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
